entities.description: Major Depressive Episode, a condition used to classify respondents in this context.
RC-ADULT: SAW/TALK TO MD/PROF ABOUT DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS IN PAST YEAR
RC-ADULT: USED RX MEDICATION FOR DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS IN PAST YEAR
RC-ADULT: RECEIVED TREATMENT/COUNSELING OR USED RX MED FOR DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS IN PAST YEAR
RC-ADULT: SAW/TALK TO GENERAL PRACTITIONER/FAMILY DOCTOR ABOUT DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS IN PAST YEAR
RC-ADULT: SAW/TALK TO OTHER MD ABOUT DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS IN PAST YEAR
RC-ADULT: SAW/TALK TO PSYCHOLOGIST ABOUT DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS IN PAST YEAR
RC-ADULT: SAW/TALK TO PSYCHIATRIST ABOUT DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS IN PAST YEAR
RC-ADULT: SAW/TALK TO OTHER MD ABOUT DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS IN PAST YEAR
RC-ADULT: SAW/TALK TO MD/PROF ABOUT DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS IN PAST YEAR

relationships.description: Indicates that the respondent was classified as having a Major Depressive Episode.
Respondent saw or talked to a medical professional about depressive feelings in the past year.
Respondent used prescription medication for depressive feelings in the past year.
Respondent received treatment/counseling or used prescription medication for depressive feelings in the past year.
Respondent saw or talked to a general practitioner/family doctor about depressive feelings in the past year.
Respondent saw or talked to another medical doctor about depressive feelings in the past year.
Respondent saw or talked to a psychologist about depressive feelings in the past year.
Respondent saw or talked to a psychiatrist about depressive feelings in the past year.
